snippet.title: Subdivision Infinity DX - Available August 8th!
snippet.description:
🎮 Get it now! 🎮

Nintendo Switch NA ➡️ http://bit.ly/2ZeGNxU
Nintendo Switch EU ➡️ http://bit.ly/2ZfNRdK

Xbox One ➡️ http://bit.ly/2MfAyHB

PS4 EU ➡️ http://bit.ly/2Ysyv9k
PS4 NA ➡️ http://bit.ly/2KHjLuX

---

"Subdivision Infinity DX" is an immersive, and pulse-pounding, next-gen sci-fi 3D space shooter.

Ready your ship and cruise the vast expanse of space in over 40 engaging missions spread throughout 5 distinct locales. Hunt down and destroy enemy spacecraft, crush capital ships, mine asteroids for rare minerals, bounty hunt, and find blueprints to craft stunning new vessels! 

Subdivision Infinity DX features arcade-style gameplay, fast-paced space-based dogfights, and dynamic boss battles! Experience an array of optional goals beyond the story's main missions that will keep you cruising through, and exploring, the wilds of space. 

Powered by Unreal 4, Subdivision Infinity DX will be released on Steam, PS4, Xbox One, and Nintendo Switch August 8th, 2019.

---

FOLLOW US ON

Blowfish Studios Twitter ► http://bit.ly/2PkYmHq
Blowfish Studios Facebook ► http://bit.ly/2LGKwNr
Blowfish Studios Instagram ► http://bit.ly/2MDhRxW
